channel.title: My Pocket Coach
channel.managingEditor: my-pocket-coach@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
channel.copyright: © Image Excellence Group - all rights reserved
channel.description:
We empower others through our unique holistic, integrated and scientific approach to achieve personal impact power.

The IE Group is a multi-disciplinary team of specialists coaching an awareness of best-practice leadership and the vital emotional and behavioural tools required to lead, direct and motivate with distinction.

We empower our clients to communicate with impact, manage impressions, influence and master interpersonal competence.

Recorded and produced at https://SolidGoldStudios.co.za #BeHeard
channel.itunes:subtitle: Africa's Leading Image, Communication and Leadership Coaches.
channel.itunes:author: Image Excellence Group | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
